response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance, making it invaluable to you at its true worth of $1,200,000. Considering its immense value to you, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to ensure that you benefit from the unparalleled features and capabilities of this product while maximizing your investment. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 950000}
